com.yammer.metrics.stats

Class Snapshot

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yammer.metrics.stats.Snapshot

  • public class Snapshot
extends Object
    A statistical snapshot of a Snapshot.

      Create a new Snapshot with the given values.
